description: Players have thrown the balls in the treehouses in the correct order
Players have felt the right numbers, 0128, and filled it in, in the keypad
Players have counted the shapes and found the code, 7867 or 8978, and filled it in, in the keypad
players have decrypted the code in the doghouse using the fence's alphabet. Code: 5038
players have put the flowers in the correct order and read can get the code from the bottom of the plants. Code: 1527
the players have seen the pictures of max's vacations and deduced where and when he went. (code: 3612)
players have moved the 4 squidge to the center of the track.
players have used the squeeky-toy in the correct rhythm
players have put the sinus wave correctly and and gotten the code from the center speaker (####)
players have gotten the cyllinders out of the dogtoy. (code ####)
